cast.overview: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.
cast.title: We Were Soldiers

details.biography: Matt Mangum was born in Georgia and raised in the Atlanta area. After 6 years of working in Los Angeles he returned to Atlanta where he continues to work in film and television. He is represented in Los Angeles, Atlanta and New Orleans by J Pervis Talent Agency and was most recently seen in the 2014 release "Let's Be Cops".  - IMDb Mini Biography By: JPTA
details.name: Matt Mangum
